name: sox-compliance
description: Sarbanes-Oxley compliance for financial controls, audit trails, and internal controls
author: Hermetic Labs

card.title: SOX Compliance
card.description: Financial controls, audit trails, and internal controls

summary.overview: Sarbanes-Oxley compliance suite covering control documentation, audit trail management, segregation of duties validation, access control reviews, and deficiency reporting.
summary.exampleUseCase: Document financial controls, validate segregation of duties in approval workflows, review access controls quarterly, and generate deficiency reports for external auditors.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Immutable audit trails for SOX 404 compliance. Automated segregation of duties checks. Integrates with workflow engine for control testing documentation.
